resources.string:
"Image puzzle game allows to split the single image to several pieces and puts in different order." "

To win the game, as we do in puzzle, needs to drag each pieces into their respective position to form the original image." "

There are three ways to select the Game play Image for shuffling. The first way is to select image from Gallery and, second way is to capture image directly with Camera. Both ways are possible from within the game and don't need to close and re-open the game. Third way is to play with default image (rose) comes with game." "

Image puzzle game has eight levels for each difficulty. All 8 levels are easy and free to play. Game levels can be selected by clicking on the settings icon (bottom left corner) or can also play next-level after finishing the game."
